t: The Coral – Luxury defined by Nature
s: A pure paradise of one million square meters of beautiful sand dunes, exquisite beaches, cool freshwater streams, natural lagoons and tropical coco and palm plantations. The Coral offers exceptional properties and real estate investment opportunities in the fastest growing area in Northeast Brazil.

t: Amazon Reef - Wikipedia
s: 3 weeks ago - The Amazon Reef, or Amazonian Reef, is an extensive coral and sponge reef system, located in the Atlantic Ocean off the coast of French Guiana and northern Brazil. It is one of the largest known reef systems in the world, with scientists estimating its length at over 1,000 kilometres (600 miles), ...

t: Ultimate Brazil Adventure: Rio de Janeiro, the Amazon, North Pantanal & the Coral Coast - 14 Days | kimkim
s: August 5, 2024 - Spend two weeks immersed in Brazil's diverse wonders, from the Rio skyline to the Amazon jungles and beyond. Tour Rio de Janeiro's iconic landmarks and beaches, then fly to the Amazon for several days in a jungle lodge. Cruise the mighty river, fish for piranha with locals, and catch a caiman before heading to the wetlands of the North Pantanal to spot jaguars, ocelots, and exotic birds.
